page.description: Show an XML document and parse into an Xbasic dot variable.

section.description: The ShowXML() function is a utility Xbasic function that is helpful in understanding the structure of an XML Document.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The image below shows the user interface displayed by the ShowXML() function. The first image shows the XML pane where the raw XML is displayed. The second image shows the Xbasic Properties pane is shown where a tree view of the Xbasic variable (into which the XML has been parsed) is shown.
